forum.content:
這畫面不知道感動多少人！

"I live my life a quarter mile at a time. You do too. That’s why we’re brothers.

No matter where you are…whether it’s a quarter mile away or half way across the world,

you’ll always be family"



我曾經說我只活在1/4哩競速的當下，我想這也是你會和我成為兄弟的原因，因為你也是這樣的人。不論你在1/4哩外，或是在地球的另一邊，你都與我同在，而你也永遠是我的兄弟。

urls.description: Must watch in loop.. i publicize this scene to allow people to re-view this a lot of time who want..
urls.title: Fast & Furious 7 Ending scene   Paul Walker  EPIC emotional Tribute Goodbye Paul

forum.title: To paul
